[
    Declare(
        Declare {
            span: Span(
                3,
                1,
            ),
            entries: DeclareEntryGroup {
                start: Span(
                    3,
                    8,
                ),
                end: Span(
                    3,
                    12,
                ),
                entries: [
                    DeclareEntry {
                        key: SimpleIdentifier {
                            span: Span(
                                3,
                                9,
                            ),
                            value: "a",
                        },
                        span: Span(
                            3,
                            10,
                        ),
                        value: LiteralInteger {
                            span: Span(
                                3,
                                11,
                            ),
                            value: "1",
                        },
                    },
                ],
            },
            body: Block {
                start: Span(
                    3,
                    13,
                ),
                statements: [
                    Expression(
                        SemicolonTerminated {
                            inner: Variable(
                                SimpleVariable(
                                    SimpleVariable {
                                        span: Span(
                                            4,
                                            5,
                                        ),
                                        name: "a",
                                    },
                                ),
                            ),
                            semicolon: Span(
                                4,
                                7,
                            ),
                        },
                    ),
                ],
                end: (
                    Span(
                        5,
                        1,
                    ),
                    Span(
                        5,
                        11,
                    ),
                ),
            },
        },
    ),
    Declare(
        Declare {
            span: Span(
                7,
                1,
            ),
            entries: DeclareEntryGroup {
                start: Span(
                    7,
                    8,
                ),
                end: Span(
                    7,
                    14,
                ),
                entries: [
                    DeclareEntry {
                        key: SimpleIdentifier {
                            span: Span(
                                7,
                                9,
                            ),
                            value: "b",

                        span: Span(
                            7,
                            10,
                        ),
                        value: LiteralString {
                            span: Span(
                                7,
                                11,
                            ),
                            value: "9",
                        },
                    },
                ],
            },
            body: Block {
                start: Span(
                    7,
                    15,
                ),
                statements: [
                    Expression(
                        SemicolonTerminated {
                            inner: Variable(
                                SimpleVariable(
                                    SimpleVariable {
                                        span: Span(
                                            8,
                                            5,
                                        ),
                                        name: "a",
                                    },
                                ),
                            ),
                            semicolon: Span(
                                8,
                                7,

                end: (
                    Span(
                        9,
                        1,
                    ),
                    Span(
                        9,
                        11,
                    ),
                ),
            },
        },
    ),
    Declare(
        Declare {
            span: Span(
                11,
                1,
            ),
            entries: DeclareEntryGroup {
                start: Span(
                    11,
                    8,
                ),
                end: Span(
                    11,
                    17,

                entries: [
                    DeclareEntry {
                        key: SimpleIdentifier {
                            span: Span(
                                11,
                                9,

                            value: "foo",

                        span: Span(
                            11,
                            12,

                            span: Span(
                                11,
                                13,

                            value: "1.42",

                    },
                ],

                span: Span(
